alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Lawrence; Lewis; Maury; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 8:04PM CDT until March 30 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lewis County in Middle Tennessee... Eastern Wayne County in Middle Tennessee... Lawrence County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Maury County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Hickman County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 804 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hohenwald to Underwood-Petersville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Hohenwald, Waynesboro, Loretto, Collinwood, Summertown, St. Joseph, Ethridge, Gordonsburg, Kimmins, Henryville, Cypress Inn, Leoma, Westpoint, Iron City and Hampshire. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee.
